actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to convert a temporary Federal judgeship in the district of Hawaii to a permanent judgeship, extend statutory authority for magistrate positions in Guam and the Northern Mariana Islands, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Converts a temporary Federal judgeship in the district of Hawaii to a permanent judgeship. Provides permanent statutory authority for magistrate positions in the district courts of Guam and the Northern Mariana Islands.

titles.title: A bill to convert a temporary Federal judgeship in the district of Hawaii to a permanent judgeship, extend statutory authority for magistrate positions in Guam and the Northern Mariana Islands, and for other purposes.
